step.desc: build eth2 stream, send packet and put statistics to stdout,check the statistics
analyse statistics via result of above step
step.comment: expect is "sent is not 0ï¼Œbut userDefinedStat2 is 0" use the follow sentence -e "checkEqualTxWithRX ${tx_port1} ${rx_port1} framesSent userDefinedStat2 result is blocked"
expect is "sent is not equal with userDefinedStat2" use the follow sentence -e "checkEqualTxWithRX ${tx_port1} ${rx_port1} framesSent userDefinedStat2 result is not equal"
